problem_text_cn: 如图,矩形的两条对角线的一个交角为60°,AC+BD=20cm,则AB的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the intersection of the two diagonals of the rectangle is N_0, AC + BD = N_1, then the length of AB is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD是矩形,∴AC=BD,OA=OC=OD=OB,∵AC+BD=20,∴OA=OB=5,∵∠AOB=60°,∴△AOB是等边三角形,∴AB=OA=5,故选:D．
raw_comment: 本题考查矩形的性质、等边三角形的判定等知识,解题的关键是证明△AOB是等边三角形,属于中考常考题型．
